entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 12:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: ENE 12 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain except rain along parts of the coast early this afternoon. Rainfall amount 20 mm along parts of the coast. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:40 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending before morning then cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:40 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
